text: Bottle Squad on a mission to save the day
Pint sized super heroes who love to play
Being a friend to everyone!
Bottle Squad with a Boom We're ready to Zoom
Bottle Squad!
PAT A CAKE

Pat a cake, Pat a cake,
Baker’s man
Bake me a cake as fast as you can!
“Miss Polly will love a cake for her birthday!
Great idea, Bethany!”
“Thanks Blake!”
“Music Baker!
For the Best Cakes, The Best Songs while Baking!”
“You can’t bake, because your speaker’s broken, huh?
Hmmm
We can all sing while you bake

I know! 
Let’s Power up!”
“Ba-Ba-Boom! We’re ready to zoom!”

Pat a cake, Pat a cake,
Baker’s man
Bake us a cake as fast as you can
Mix it, and stir it, and mark it with a “P”
And put it in the oven for the Babies and me

Strawberry, Strawberry,
Strawberry cake,
Miss Polly’s favorite that we’re going to bake!
Mixing, then cooking, then marking with a P!
It smells more yummy than we thought it would be!
“Well I guess you were looking for Icing, Mr. Baker?”
Hmmm
“Don’t you worry, Mr.Baker. Leave it to me!”

Pat a Cake, Pat a Cake
Baker’s Man
We’re making the icing as fast as we can.
Mixing, then pouring, then putting in to freeze!
Pull it out of the freezer, get icing for me!
“The icing should be ready when the cake is done!”

Bottle Squad, Bottle Squad,
Saved the Day!
Making icing the super smart way!
Now we have yummy cake for Miss Polly!
We’ll even have some icing for her dolly!
“Be sure to only eat the icing on the cake next time!”

Pat a cake, Pat a cake,
Baker’s man
You baked us a cake as fast as you could
You Mixed it, and stirred it, and marked it with a “P”
It’s perfect and ready for birthday girl Polly
“Yeah! That looks awesome!
Thank you Mr. Baker’s Man!”
“Good thing we had Ms. Polly’s dolly here to help pick out the cake flavor!”
“Happy Birthday, Miss Polly!”
“Oh Thank you babies! What a lovely…”
“Oh Dolly, when will you ever learn to stop eating?”

“We power up, and don’t give up!
That’s our ba-ba-promise to you!”
